Description: Optimization of a linear objective function subject to linear equality and inequality constraints
Solvability: Polyhedral (can be solved in polynomial time)
Example: Maximizing profit subject to resource constraints

Description: Optimization of a linear objective function subject to linear constraints where some or all variables are restricted to be integers
Solvability: NP-hard (can be solved using branch and bound

Description: Optimization of a nonlinear objective function subject to nonlinear constraints
Solvability: Non-convex (can be solved using gradient-based methods
Appearances: Minimizing cost subject to nonlinear constraints

Description: Optimization of a quadratic objective function subject to linear constraints
Solvability: Convex (can be solved in polynomial time)

Description: Optimization of a linear objective function subject to linear constraints where some variables are integers and others are continuous
Solvability: NP-hard (can be solved using branch and bound

Description: Optimization of a convex objective function subject to convex constraints
Solvability: Convex (can be solved in polynomial time)

Description: Optimization of a linear objective function subject to conic constraints
Solvability: Convex (can be solved in polynomial time)

Description: Optimization of an objective function subject to uncertainty modeled by probability distributions
Solvability: NP-hard (can be solved using scenario-based methods

Description: Optimization of a sequential decision problem by breaking it down into simpler subproblems
Solvability: Dependent on the problem structure (can be solved using Bellman equation)

Description: Optimization of multiple conflicting objective functions subject to constraints
Solvability: NP-hard (can be solved using Pareto optimality
